pages.text: Ate mera bacana saca rakha, ba'ada vica a'una vale lokam vica
Ate mainu janata di ni'amata de varisam vicom bana
Ate mere pita nu mu'afa kara besaka unha kurahi'e lokam vicom hai
Ate mainu usa dina be'izata na kari jadom loka mura jivata kite janage
jisa dina na dhana ate na aulada kama a'egi
Paratu uha jihare alaha kola khalisa dila lai ke a'e
Ate janata darana vali'am de nere kiti javegi
Ate bhatakana vali'am la'i naraka di aga ka bei ja'egi
ate nu kiha javega ki kithe hana uha jinham di tusim puja karade si
Alaha tom' binham. Ki uha tuhadi madada karanage jam ki uha apana baca'a kara sakade hana
Phira usa vica mudhe muha suta dite janage
Uha ate sari'am de sare bhatake ho'e loka ate ibalisa di phauja
Uha usa vica apisa vica larade ho'e kahinage
Alaha di sahu asim sapasata kurahi'e si
Jadom ki asim' tuhanu (butam nu) sasara ve malaka de barabara manade si
Ate sanu tam basa papi lokam ne gumaraha kara dita
Isa la'i huna sada ko'i sifarasi nahim
Ate na hi ko'i pi'ara mitara
Kasa! Asim (sasara vica) phira vapisa mura ja'i'e ate asim imana vale bani'e
Besaka isa vica nisani hai ate unham vicom zi'adatara loka imana li'a'una vale nahim
Ate besaka tera raba takatavara ate rahimata vala hai
Nuha di kauma ne rasulam tom inakara kita
Jadom ki unham de bhara nuha ne unham nu kiha, ki tusim darade nahimâ€ ho
maim tuhade la'i ika bharoseyoga rasula ham
Isa la'i tusim loka alaha tom daro ate meri gala mano
Ate maim isa kama la'i tuhade tom ko'i bheta nahim magada. Mera seva fala tam sirafa alaha de jimee hai jihara sare sasara da raba hai
Phira tusi' alaha tom daro ate meri gala mano
Unham ne kiha ki asim tuhanu mana la'i'e, halanki tuhade hukama da palana nivem padhara de lokam ne kita hai
